column1: Kata Robata////We started with the Kobe Beef Skewers. Pricey at $17 a pop
column2: but pretty delicious and unique. My wife and I don't normally eat beef
column3: but her eyes got big at tasting these little chunks of kobe. We also got the Hamachi and Jalapeno sashimi. It was pretty good
column4: but I think it was one of my least favorite items of the night.
